channel.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
channel.description:
I think this is a new idea and i hope everyone likes it. [b] Bscly post WALLPAPERS, APP SKINS, OS or DOCK ICONS, VISUAL STYLES, APPS or anything else that you have made which comes under the category "CUSTOMIZATION".[/b]
I'm pretty sure a lot of people out here would have, at some point of their lives, made something that would be used to customize the look of their OS or some App etc.
So come out and share your creations with us! :slight_smile:
I'll start off >>
[b][u]Real Player File Icons Version 1 >> [/u][/b][url='https://lamboman7.deviantart.com/art/Real-Player-file-Combo-Pack-118247554']DOWNLOAD[/url] ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
λdam:

Itunes icon:

It was stolen off of me last year… Goddamn Faggots.

That’s sweet. I like the hand drawn look. I agree with level, it would be neat to have more of these. Might make an interesting icon set.

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
LamboMan:

And its great to see so many C&H fans out here!

Good to be here too There are very few fans I’ve come across here in the UK, unsurprisingly…
.

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: LamboMan
item.description:
Siggs:

That’s a sweet compilation man! But Is it possible to tweak the colours so they’re all the same? Hobbes changes quite obviously.

But again, sweet idea.
.

Haha, thanks bro! Yeah, i know Hobbes’ color changes a bit, but if you really want to have a shade of orange for him you’ll have to do it in Photoshop. Which might take quite some time.

Spooks:

Out of my sick, twisted imagination.

Lol, i’d love to see what else comes out of your imagination!

And its great to see so many C&H fans out here!

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: Spooks
item.description:
Jokerine:

I really like that one. Mind if I use it? Although it might end up looking kinda wonky on my 1280x800 screen…

Be my guest, if you’re worried about the resolution just crop it or set it on ‘centered’ from the Desktop Properties.

LamboMan:

Where’d you get it?

Out of my sick, twisted imagination.

I usually come up with an idea once in a while, I may post more walls, I’m not sure if I can be bothered for icons and the sort.

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread

item.description:
Siggs:

^Too true ^_^. Got all the book compilations, and the huge 3-book collection with every comic.


.

Expensive, but totally worth it. I loved every minute of it.

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: Spooks
item.description:
A wallpaper I made long time ago. Basically copy-pasting a bunch of cube primitives, taking a shitload to render (but not really), then fixing the color a bit, but meh, I think it’s rather nice.

And there’s this awesome screenshot of the Ep. 2 Citadel Vista which I played with in Ps and find quite kick-ass:

And, there’s this. I dare you use it.

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
LamboMan:

so if i store all the gimp icons in one .ico file it’ll automatically save it as an icon that windows can choose the res from?

Yep, if your project has several layers in it GIMP will store them all as icon layers in one .ico file. Windows can then use them.

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: LamboMan
item.description:
so if i store all the gimp icons in one .ico file it’ll automatically save it as an icon that windows can choose the res from?

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: Duck
item.description:
I like the real player icons, Im so using them… is it for real player or just icons?

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
LamboMan:

Yeah, i know that but i never understood how to do it. Is there any specific way to do that or is just as easy as putting them into separate layers and saving the file?

Depends on the shop* you use I guess. I know how to do it with GIMP. But yes, basically it’s just putting into seperate layers and saving them to a single file. Icon files can also store icos with different palettes. You can choose on export in gimp in which palette a layer should be stored in. You can also force png compression on them.

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: LamboMan
item.description:
popsUlfr:

What I mean is that an .ico file can store multiple layers . So if you change your icon size in Windows it will pick the layer of the same res. Therefore you don’t have to rely on the resizing abilities of Windows to show you the 48x48 version of the 128x128 icon…

EDIT: Adam thats genious! I dig that!

Yeah, i know that but i never understood how to do it. Is there any specific way to do that or is just as easy as putting them into separate layers and saving the file?

Read full topic

item.title: The CUSTOMIZATION Thread
item.dc:creator: popsUlfr
item.description:
LamboMan:

I don’t understand.:[ All the Gimp icons are already in 1 pack.

And BTW, thanks for your comment buddy!

EDIT :
That ain’t bad at all Adam. Nice look!

What I mean is that an .ico file can store multiple layers . So if you change your icon size in Windows it will pick the layer of the same res. Therefore you don’t have to rely on the resizing abilities of Windows to show you the 48x48 version of the 128x128 icon…

EDIT: Adam thats genious! I dig that!

Read full topic

On the note of the GIMP icons: why don’t you add all icon sizes into one single file ?

I don’t understand.:[ All the Gimp icons are already in 1 pack.

And BTW, thanks for your comment buddy!

EDIT :
That ain’t bad at all Adam. Nice look!
